channel.title: crash at we've got hostiles
channel.description: 5 minutes into the level, source engine crashed to an error window saying " Engine Error- Can't load lump 53, allocation of 14821501 bytes failed!!!" iv'e attached a screen shot of the error window, and the source engine dump file, just thought the developers would want to see this any ways back to popping head crabs ![Untitled.jpg|690x500](upload://nEPPrhkaxE1wWyIrz6s6DDgmjqE.jpeg) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T2_4_2C0.mdmp (88.5 KB)

item.title: crash at we've got hostiles
item.dc:creator: sgt_McMuffin
item.description:
Second crash to report this time in blast pit when you go through the level transition between the silo with the xen tentacle in it and the area with the exhaust fan. this time no error message from hl2 just a windows pop up saying that it stopped responding. ill post the dump file for it when the forum file attachments quits herp derping.

Read full topic

item.title: crash at we've got hostiles
item.dc:creator: sgt_McMuffin
item.description:
5 minutes into the level, source engine crashed to an error window saying
" Engine Error- Can’t load lump 53, allocation of 14821501 bytes failed!!!"
iv’e attached a screen shot of the error window, and the source engine dump file, just thought the developers would want to see this any ways back to popping head crabs
